prompt: Filter rows keeping only the first 500 rows, starting from the last 1000 rows (i.e., rows 501 to 1000 from the end).
error:
Error: Row index $nrow-999 must be integer >0

Command was: rowrange $nrow-999 $nrow-500

Usage: rowrange <first> <last>|+<count>
    (Row index $nrow-999 must be integer >0)

prompt: Generate a JSON MOC for the objects in the middle 2000 rows of my catalog.
response: stilts pixfoot in=my_catalog.fits icmd='rowrange ($nrow/2 - 1000) +2000' mocfmt=json out=middle_2k.moc.json
error:
Error: Row index ($nrow/2 must be integer >0

Command was: rowrange ($nrow/2 - 1000) +2000

Usage: rowrange <first> <last>|+<count>
    (Row index ($nrow/2 must be integer >0)
